name: Vetcove
headline: Powering the animal health supply chain.
description:
Vetcove is how veterinarians buy the supplies they need to keep America's pets healthy.  Our community of more than 18,000 veterinary hospitals employs tens of thousands of veterinarians and delivers care to many millions of animals every year across all 50 states.  As of 2022, we power purchasing and supply chain infrastructure for half of America's general practices, emergency and specialty clinics, SPCAs, zoos, aquariums, and veterinary consolidators.

Vetcove's eCommerce and mobile platforms afford veterinary hospitals a frictionless purchasing experience, and facilitate delivery of medications to pet parents across the country. Simply put, Vetcove helps veterinary organizations spend more time giving care, and less time comparing suppliers and managing inventory. We're completely revolutionizing the way veterinarians discover and buy products, and how animal health brands engage their veterinary customers.

We're hiring!  Come join us on our journey to transform how vets buy and prescribe the animal healthcare products that keep our pets in peak condition.
generated_description:
**Vetcove: Revolutionizing Veterinary Supply Chain Management**

Founded in 2015 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S16, Vetcove is based in Miami, FL, and has quickly established itself as a crucial player in the veterinary supply landscape. Their mission? To power the animal health supply chain for a community of over 18,000 veterinary hospitals that service millions of animals across the United States.

Vetcove began as a simple idea: to streamline how veterinarians purchase the supplies essential for keeping pets healthy. As of 2022, they are now the go-to purchasing platform for approximately half of the country’s veterinary clinics, including general practices, specialty and emergency clinics, SPCAs, and even zoos and aquariums. The company employs a team of around 83 individuals, all devoted to improving veterinary supply efficiency.

**What Does Vetcove Offer?**

Vetcove's eCommerce and mobile platforms are designed to eliminate the friction traditionally associated with veterinary supply ordering. It significantly reduces the time practitioners spend comparing prices from various suppliers. Instead of juggling multiple websites, veterinarians can access one integrated platform where they can quickly browse products, compare prices in real-time, manage inventories, and even have medications delivered directly to pet owners' doorsteps. 

The beauty here lies in its simplicity and efficacy—this allows veterinary clinics to focus more on what they do best: providing care to animals, rather than getting lost in purchasing logistics.

**Why Is It Free?**

A key aspect of Vetcove’s business model is that it’s completely free for veterinary clinics. This financial structure is supported by partnerships with corporations that utilize Vetcove’s data and analytics services, essentially letting independent practices access a sophisticated purchasing platform without any costs.

**Growing Community and Feedback**

With over 19,000 veterinary hospitals using Vetcove regularly, the feedback from the community has been overwhelmingly positive. Users appreciate the time savings, ease of price comparison, and a plethora of other features that improve ordering efficiency. Many have remarked how Vetcove has transformed their procurement processes from tedious and time-consuming to quick and enjoyable.

**Join the Vetcove Movement**

If you’re involved in veterinary care and are tired of the cumbersome ordering processes that detract from your practice, Vetcove might just be the tool you didn’t know you needed. They’re actively hiring, which speaks volumes about their growth potential and commitment to revolutionizing veterinary supplies.

For more details or to get started, visit their website at [Vetcove](https://www.vetcove.com). Embrace a smarter way to manage your practice’s inventory—after all, effective supply chain management is a significant part of providing excellent animal care!
